column4: I go into Add a Printer, and under 'User a detexted printer' it has 7 entries each prefixed with Epson Stylus they read 'directory', 'file', 'ls', 'mtink', 'No', 'or' and 'such'
which one is useable if any?
void: I love good old sound cards they always work
especially if they're jumperless but _not_ pnp
